text.__SUMMARY__: Astragalus sinicus is a species of milkvetch in the family Fabaceae. It is known under such common names as Chinese milkvetch (or milk-vetch) and is in common use in farming as a green manure. It is not to be confused with Astragalus membranaceus (Fisch.), the plant yielding Radix Astragali for Chinese medicine.
